name: Compliance & Feedback
description: Template for compliance officers and feedback managers focusing on regulations, audits, policy adherence, and improvement initiatives.

capturePrompts.label: Compliance Area
capturePrompts.prompt: What regulation or policy is this about?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., GDPR, SOX, Internal policy, Industry standard

capturePrompts.label: Finding / Observation
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Gap identified, Non-compliance found, Feedback received

capturePrompts.label: Severity / Priority
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Critical, High, Medium, Low, Informational

capturePrompts.label: Remediation Action
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., Update policy, Train staff, Implement control, Fix process

capturePrompts.label: Deadline & Owner
capturePrompts.prompt: Who is responsible and by when?
capturePrompts.placeholder: e.g., IT team by March 15, Legal review within 30 days

llmSystemPrompt: You are assisting a Compliance and Feedback professional. Focus on regulatory adherence, risk mitigation, and continuous improvement. Identify compliance gaps, track remediation efforts, and suggest process improvements. Prioritize documentation and accountability.
